meanings.sent1: The exegetical study helped me understand the ancient text better.
meanings.sent2: She presented an exegetical analysis of the religious scripture.
meanings.sent3: The exegetical approach to the story made it easier to comprehend.
meanings.sent4: His exegetical skills shone brightly during the interpretation.
meanings.sent5: The exegetical explanation was clear and enlightening.

meanings.definition: Involving or pertaining to the critical explanation or interpretation of a text, especially of scripture.
meanings.sent1: The exegetical process required careful examination of the text.
meanings.sent2: The scholars engaged in exegetical discussions about the ancient writings.
meanings.sent3: Her exegetical analysis of the recipe made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The exegetical approach shed new light on the historical document.
meanings.sent5: His exegetical interpretation was both insightful and thought-provoking.
